quotes.quote: Surprise, bitch. I bet you thought you'd seen the last of me.
When witches don't fight, we burn.
Balenciaga!
I am the Supreme.
The only thing worse than a witch is a bored witch.
Power is not meant to be shared.
Every witch needs a coven.
Out, damned spot! Out, I say!
I will not be replaced.
You're going to die in there.
Fear is the cheapest room in the house.
We are all descendants of the Salem witches.
I was not born to be ordinary.
There is nothing but pain and chaos waiting for you out there.
We are the daughters of the witches you couldn't burn.
To live without you, only that would be torture.
You know how I feel about you. I want you and only you. Like Gomez to Morticia, I'll always give you my unwavering devotion, if you'll have me.
Did I do something brave to save my friends, or did I finally find a way to kill myself?
Magic doesn’t come from talent. It comes from pain.
You don’t get to be offended by facts.
Grow up. You’re not special. No one is.
Just because something is broken doesn’t mean it can’t be fixed.
quotes.episode: Have You Brought Me Little Cakes

quotes.quote: We’re not heroes. We’re people who screw up and keep going.
I choose to be alive.
quotes.episode: No Better to Be Safe Than Sorry

quotes.quote: You get what you need, not what you want.
Being human is exhausting, but it beats the alternatives.
Love isn’t something you earn by suffering enough.
